Title: Directs the board of standards and appeals in the city of New York to mail a copy of each application for a variance to property owners within 1 mile
Summary: Directs the board of standards and appeals in the city of New York to mail a copy of each application for a variance to property owners within 1 mile of the affected property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the board of standards and appeals to forward a copy of each application to vary the zoning resolution or for a special permit to each owner of real property within one mile of the land to which such application applies
